description:
When Mois unleashes Armageddon upon Earth for real, Keroro is obliged to try and stop her, especially since he accidentally encouraged the Great Lord of Terror. Then, there are a lot of mysteries surrounding Saburo, and Fuyuki learns about one of them when he follows Saburo after school... and comes face to face with a number of parallel world Saburos!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mois, Goodbye Pekopon / Saburo, The Mysterious Boy
モア さよならペコポン / サブロー 謎多き少年
